title: FS: 74 SGC Graded T205's - HOF'ers, SP's, Variations
author: asoriano

posts.post_title: FS: 74 SGC Graded T205's - HOF'ers, SP's, Variations
posts.post_content:
$3245 OBO: 

A quick and easy way to grab ~30% of the T205 set in one fell swoop. Condition ranges from SGC 10 - SGC 60. 

The cards can be viewed <a href="http://imageevent.com/babybingbaseball/t205sforsale" >here.
I'm interested in a few of you decide to break them up
